tasks.label: build Aseprite extension
tasks.command: if [[ ${fileBasename} == *.lua ]]; then rm ${fileBasenameNoExtension}.aseprite-extension; zip -r build.zip extension/* && mv build.zip ${fileBasenameNoExtension}.aseprite-extension; else echo 'Build error: ${fileBasename} is not a lua file' >&2; exit 1; fi
